metadata.title: CVE-2015-1539 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Multiple integer underflows in the ESDS::parseESDescriptor function inESDS.cpp in libstagefright in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48I allow remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted ESDS atoms, aka internalbug 20139950, a related issue to CVE-2015-4493.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
